text:
I was proud to cosponsor and vote in favor of this resolution honoring the life and legacy of American patriot Charlie Kirk. 

Charlie was a devoted Christian, a dedicated husband, and a loving father who died for his beliefs. 

His words and legacy will live on forever.

Happy birthday, @usairforce!

For the last 78 years, the courageous men and women of the U.S. Air Force have dominated the skies, ensuring that America can defeat its enemies anytime, anywhere. 

Thank you to our brave men and women for their continued service to these United States!

This week is National Truck Driver Appreciation Week, honoring the men and women who keep our country running.

Michigan is home to over 247,000 trucking jobs and nearly 70,000 trucking companies.

My dad started a trucking company with one truck, one trailer, and no excuses. I know how crucial this industry is, and I’ll always have America’s truckers’ backs.
Watch the full @RepublicanStudy podcast here: https://t.co/kTVND3v45N

I was a cadet at West Point on 9/11. That day, everything changed. 

At that moment, we understood why we were there: to lead men & women into battle, and back out. https://t.co/c4T9SmCsdS

Our West Point class was the first to know that we were going to war after graduation day. 

I served in Operation Iraqi Freedom and if given the chance, I’d do it all over again. This country is worth fighting and sacrificing for and I am deeply proud to support this resolution with @RepPatRyanNY  establishing Patriot Week from September 11-17.

America is the greatest country in history, and it is our duty to uphold these values for generations to come.

Today we remember those who ran toward danger.

Never Forget.🇺🇸 https://t.co/md2VoNwjP2

For every $1,000 increase in home cost, 3,393 families are priced out of the market. 

Meanwhile, Whitmer is pushing new building codes that would add $15,000 to the cost of a new home, blocking tens of thousands of MI families from the American Dream of homeownership.

I'm fighting to keep that dream alive.

Cashless bail and woke soft-on-crime policies put our communities at risk. 

Proud to co-lead @RepStefanik's bill to stop rogue judges from repeatedly putting criminals back onto our streets without cash bail.

Too many innocent people have been victimized by violent repeat offenders. Enough is enough.

Thank you @AGPamBondi for expanding Joint Task Force Alpha to cover our northern border.

Border security is national security, and for too long, our northern border has been a vulnerability. Under @POTUS those days are over. 

Already, Joint Task Force Alpha arrested a MI woman who trafficked aliens, including children, across our northern border. I look forward to continuing to work with @POTUS to PERMANENTLY secure our borders!
The One Big Beautiful Bill is a Working Families Tax Cut that delivers for ALL of Michigan! https://t.co/bxnpgqcQFW

Happy Labor Day!

Michigan has the best workers in the world and knows the value of hard work. 

Today, we honor the grit, dedication, and ingenuity of the men and women who make our state & country run! https://t.co/HiIrOaq4mw

The disastrous Afghanistan withdrawal under President Biden was one of the most shameful moments in our nation's history. 13 American heroes were lost due to his reckless incompetence.

Today and everyday, we honor the memory of the 13 brave souls, our Gold Star Families, & every service member who laid down their life for this great nation.

No better way to spend National Aviation Day than with the brave men & women of Selfridge!

Social Security: 90 years young today! Our seniors worked hard, and we must keep our promises.

That’s one reason I supported the OBBB. It cuts taxes on Social Security, protecting benefits for future generations, and roots out waste & fraud, including 275,000 illegal immigrant recipients who were taking funds away from American seniors.
They might be from New York, but KISS will always be welcome in Detroit Rock City! Congrats to KISS on your Kennedy Center honors!

As a dad of 3 kids, education is personal. That’s why we must expand choice, empower parents, and give every child the chance to succeed — no matter their zip code.

Under @POTUS, @usedgov is doing just that. They're investing an additional $60M in the Charter Schools Program to give kids and families REAL opportunities to thrive.

Since NAFTA, Michigan has lost 300,000+ manufacturing jobs. We watched as our livelihoods and opportunities were shipped out-of-state and out-of-country.

Thankfully, with President @realdonaldtrump and @VP, those days are over.

For the first time in decades, we have a President who is standing up for American workers, American jobs, and the American middle class.

This is the United States of America — not the United States of California.

Earlier this year, @POTUS signed my bill into law stopping California’s radical EV mandate from killing thousands of Michigan jobs. MI is not afraid of the future, but we demand to be a part of it.

California radicals must follow the law. We will not let them destroy our auto industry.

I had the honor of meeting and speaking with @PattyMorin at a northern border security roundtable in Detroit with @Sec_Noem. Patty’s strength is inspiring, but she should never have had to endure this tragedy.

Rachel’s life mattered. America’s borders matter. Our laws matter.

With President Trump, we’re reversing Biden’s Border Crisis by deporting violent criminals, securing our borders, and Making America Safe Again.

Thanks to @POTUS, a new F-15EX mission is on its way.

Now it's time to ensure that Selfridge is prepared. I authored a letter to @SecAFOfficial requesting the Air Force's partnership in developing a plan to fund and complete critical runway upgrades at Selfridge.

Michigan has had three straight summers of smoke and pollution from Canadian wildfires.

That’s not right.

I sent a letter to the Canadian Prime Minister urging action. It’s time to work together to protect our people, our shared border, and our air.👇🏾 https://t.co/Jgezj2nF7x

President @realDonaldTrump delivers once again!

This historic trade deal with the EU will level the playing field and bring $600 billion in European investment to the US.

This is a return to fiscal sanity and a step toward a sustainable future that puts America First. 🇺🇸

Promises made, promises kept.

Six months in and we're delivering for the American people. https://t.co/u6wCF2BHD0

Thanks to the One Big Beautiful Bill, each and every American newborn will now get a $1,000 investment account. 

This is what it looks like to bet on America’s next generation.🇺🇸

Jobs protected. Jobs created. Futures secured.

The One Big Beautiful Bill is a win for ALL Michiganders! https://t.co/zQYKHETrXM

The Defense Appropriations passed by the House this week is a massive win for our troops, our state, and our country. 

It included five of my amendments, as well as funding to procure three additional✈️F-15EX's at Selfridge ANGB. 

I'm also especially excited about the 3.8 percent pay raise for all service members included in the bill!🇺🇸

I was proud to vote YES on the Rescissions Act this week. It's a victory for American taxpayers, slashing $9 billion in wasteful spending, including $7.9 billion in foreign aid misused by Biden to push far-left ideologies.

House Republicans, alongside @POTUS, are ensuring the American people’s hard-earned tax dollars are spent wisely abroad, not used for bureaucrat pet projects.

This week, the House passed critical legislation to return fiscal sanity to Washington with the Rescissions Act, and to strengthen our national defense with Defense Appropriations. 

We're stopping the DC bloat that is driving us towards bankruptcy while ensuring that our military is ready and prepared to keep the American people safe.

Smoke, fentanyl and foreign criminals have poured across our northern border and Canadians have their “elbows up” while President Trump generously scrambles jets to defend Vancouver.

Why are Americans spending so much on Canadian safety when it seems that they couldn’t care less about ours?

From my family to yours, happy Independence Day!🇺🇸

It was the honor of my life to defend our freedom and wear the flag in combat. Today and everyday, I hope you enjoy the blessings of the GREATEST country in the history of the world! 

God Bless America!🇺🇸 https://t.co/OWRZjL2QaG
Today I voted yes on the One Big Beautiful Bill — because it delivers on the promises President @realDonaldTrump and Republicans made in 2024. https://t.co/KKBCGSOBKh

The One Big Beautiful Bill delivers HISTORIC wins for American & Michigan manufacturing.  

By incentivizing companies to manufacture here in the US, cutting red tape, and removing tax burdens, it will create jobs at home and strengthen our critical manufacturing sector.
The One Big Beautiful Bill will FULLY and PERMANENTLY secure our border while giving our law enforcement the funding they need to keep our communities safe!

Michigan got our nation through two world wars and a global pandemic by building in America.

With the One Big Beautiful Bill, we will ensure that our tax code incentivizes Made-in-America.

It's time to bring our manufacturing back home!
Boom! Let's finish the job and get this to President Trump's Desk!

When President Trump first introduced the Child Tax Credit, it was a game changer for working families.

Now, we have the opportunity to lock in and boost the doubled Child Tax Credit for more than 40 million families with the One Big Beautiful Bill!

There are over 4 million tipped workers in the United States. 

The One Big Beautiful Bill will stop their tips from being taxed! 

It's your money--not the governments to take!

If we pass the One Big Beautiful Bill: The average American family will see a $1,300 tax CUT.

If we don't pass the One Big Beautiful Bill: The average American family will see a $1,700 tax HIKE.

The American people deserve relief and the One Big Beautiful Bill does just that!
It was great joining @SecretaryLCD in Lansing to discuss how the One Big Beautiful Bill will help small businesses all across Michigan thrive!

Small businesses are the backbone of our economy, and it's time we get them the support they need. The One Big Beautiful Bill will do just that.

➡️Incentives for R&D in America
➡️100% immediate expensing
➡️Deduction for interest expenses
➡️Enhancement of the Small Business deduction

After four years of rising costs due to Bidenflation, Michiganders deserve relief.

The One Big Beautiful Bill delivers the LARGEST tax cut in US history for families and small businesses, ensuring that you keep what you earn.

The One Big Beautiful Bill is a monumental win for Michigan's economy & the American people. It delivers:

✅Bigger Paychecks: Hardworking Americans will see an average increase in take-home pay of OVER $10,000 per year.

✅Tax Breaks for Seniors: Unprecedented financial relief for seniors.

✅Tax Relief: 15% tax cut for Americans earning between $30,000 and $80,000 per year.

✅Made-in-America Tax Breaks: Interest deduction for loans on new American-made vehicles.
The numbers are clear. It’s time to deliver for Michiganders by passing the One Big Beautiful Bill! https://t.co/b2AM62kj1v

Had a phenomenal meeting with some of the brightest young minds from FIRST Robotics teams across Southeast Michigan. 

These students aren’t just building robots—they’re building America’s future. This is exactly why we invest in STEM and skilled trades education: to prepare the next generation of engineers, innovators, and leaders.

FICTION: Vulnerable Americans will be "kicked off" Medicaid under the One Big Beautiful Bill.

FACT: The only people coming off Medicaid are those who are illegal, ineligible, or able-bodied adults refusing to work. 

Don't believe the Democrat lies--the One Big Beautiful Bill is STRENGTHENING and SUSTAINING Medicaid for the vulnerable Americans who rely on it!

🚨Big win for American security!🚨

My bill to secure our critical mineral supply just passed the Energy & Commerce Committee.

From smartphones to fighter jets, these minerals power our daily lives and our national defense—but China controls over 80% of global refining.

This bill brings that control back home, protecting jobs, strengthening supply chains, and keeping America in the lead. 🇺🇸

We don't have a healthcare system in this country; we have a sick-care system. It's time to put an end to the incentives that reward sickness over health.

Thank you for your commitment to Making America Healthy Again, @SecKennedy, you have an ally in this fight. https://t.co/7T2hK7jywe

Under the Biden Administration, fentanyl and illegal immigrants poured across our borders, threatening the safety of the American people.

The Big Beautiful Bill will permanently secure our borders and stop the devastating consequences of open border policies.

With the One Big Beautiful Bill, we are once again keeping the American people safe.

Under Biden's watch, American energy was placed under attack. 

The result? Sky-high prices for American families at the pump, grocery store, and across the board.

The One Big Beautiful Bill incentivizes MADE IN AMERICA. 

It rewards companies that build their products in America with lower taxes — and allows Americans who buy an American-made vehicle to fully deduct their auto loan interest.

This is MASSIVE for Michigan's manufacturing and auto industries!

Now more than ever, America needs to be ready to defend itself.

The One Big Beautiful Bill does just that. 

It provides $9 billion to improve the quality of life of our service members and $34 billion to expand the size and capabilities of our naval fleet.🇺🇸

The One Big Beautiful Bill is going to Make America Build Again!

It supports building new factories to grow domestic business operations by renewing 100% immediate expensing and interest deductions, increasing the small business deduction, and establishing 100% immediate expensing for equipment and machinery!

The One Big Beautiful Bill supports working families by expanding access to child care and making permanent the paid leave tax credit.

It also builds financial security for America’s children with the creation of new savings accounts at birth. 

It is time to start investing in our future generations and the One Big Beautiful Bill does just that!

As someone who went to war - thank you to our Commander-In-Chief for his iron resolve in carrying out Operation Midnight Hammer.

God Bless The President.
God Bless Our Troops.
May God Bless America.

Pray for Peace.

Once signed into law, it will unleash the American economy, permanently secure our borders, and invest in the future of our great nation!🇺🇸

We must protect Medicaid for those who need it: the elderly, disabled, pregnant women, children, and low-income families.

When illegal aliens, able-bodied adults choosing not to work, and ineligible recipients get Medicaid, they are stealing funds from those who need & deserve it.

I’m honored to recognize Petty Officer Marc W. Trail as my office’s Veteran of the Month!

Petty Officer Trail served our nation for 6 years in the Navy, deploying to the Western Pacific and Persian Gulf two times. He currently serves as an advisor for seniors, and is the co-founder of a support group for vets with Parkinson’s disease.

He is a true patriot—thank you for your service!

Senator Lee hits the nail on the head here🎯

We expect corner stores to keep age-restricted materials from minors. Shouldn’t we also expect app stores to prevent our kids from accessing adult and harmful content online?

Happy to lead this effort with you, @SenMikeLee!
https://t.co/aYjjraBpbt

Corner stores are held responsible for keeping age restricted materials like alcohol from minors.

Why shouldn’t digital app stores be held accountable for letting our kids access adult or age restricted materials as well?

My bill does just that. The App Store Accountability Act will empower parents and protect children. Thank you @SenMikeLee for your support!
